page.title: 18A day in my life in Insch.
page.content: I get up at about eight and put on my clothes.I have my breakfast,very often a bowl of cornflakes,toast and a cup of tea.Soon I wash and get ready for school at half past nine. The bell rings,so into the sums until eleven! Playtime over,we're on to English,and after that it's dinner time. I wonder what's for dinner? I soon find out;stovies and oatcakes,and ginger sponge for pudding. In the afternoon there's games and I play netball until playtime. For the last hour and a quarter we work on our project. I go up to my friend's house and we climb the old pine to see if there's any cones,but there's none. So we play on our skates. My tea's at six and I go to my bed at nine. (TRANSLATION OF PAGE 17)
